movies.title: A Summer Tale
movies.plot: The summer of '58, the year Sweden almost won the world championship in soccer over Brazil, Yngve Johansson accepts two children to live with him during the summer, as told through the eyes of a young boy. His name is Mårten, and the other child's name is Annika. She is a rough girl, with many problems. The three of them do not get along, and Yngve is a true dictator to the children's eyes. However, when the children discover that their new guardian has a crush on their teacher (Cecilia Nilsson), they do what they can to bring the two together. Soon enough, the three will discover that they have a lot more in common than they previously imagined, and together they can make their lives worth living again. This is a sweet story about life in Sweden in the mid 1900's. It is about family, love, hate, innocent friendship that we all can relate to, and much, much more. The movie invites laughter as well as tears, and the actors, both the young and the old, are very talented and the best ...
movies.simplePlot: Two kids move in with a lonely undertaker who is secretly in love with the town's school teacher.

biography.bio: Kjell Bergqvist was born on February 23, 1953 in Enskede, Stockholms län, Sweden as Kjell Bertil Leonard Bergqvist. He is an actor, known for A Summer Tale (2000), Valse pour Monica (2013) and Days Like This (2001). He has been married to Karin Bergqvist since 2004. They have one child. He was previously married to Yvonne Ryding-Bergqvist.
biography.name: Kjell Bergqvist

biography.bio: Anastasios Soulis was born on January 8, 1987 in Stockholm, Sweden. He is an actor, known for A Summer Tale (2000), Suddenly (2006) and Studentfesten (2013).
biography.name: Anastasios Soulis

biography.bio: Rebecca Scheja was born on January 26, 1989. She is an actress, known for A Summer Tale (2000), Witch in Our Family (2000) and The Wedding Photographer (2009).
biography.name: Rebecca Scheja

biography.bio: Cecilia Nilsson was born on July 15, 1957 in Stockholm, Sweden. She is an actress, known for A Summer Tale (2000), Simon & the Oaks (2011) and Lilla Jönssonligan och cornflakeskuppen (1996). She has been married to Krister Henriksson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Cecilia Nilsson

biography.bio: Brasse Brännström was born on February 27, 1945 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden as Lars Erik Brännström. He was an actor and writer, known for Fem myror är fler än fyra elefanter (1977), My Life as a Dog (1985) and Dieselråttor och sjömansmöss (2002). He was married to Git Erixon. He died on August 29, 2014 in Stockholm, Sweden.
biography.name: Brasse Brännström

biography.bio: Marcus Hasselborg was born on January 7, 1986. He is an actor, known for A Summer Tale (2000), The Ketchup Effect (2004) and Les aventures de Tsatsiki (1999).
biography.name: Marcus Hasselborg

biography.bio: Gachugo Makini was born on August 17, 1954. He is an actor, known for A Summer Tale (2000).
biography.name: Gachugo Makini

biography.bio: Göran Thorell was born on May 24, 1954 in Bromma, Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for A Summer Tale (2000), Liv i luckan med julkalendern (1988) and Pelle Svanslös (1997).
biography.name: Göran Thorell

biography.bio: Ann Petrén was born on May 25, 1954 in Västerås, Västmanlands län, Sweden as Ann Louise Maria Petrén. She is an actress, known for Dalecarlians (2004), Happy End (2011) and Everlasting Moments (2008).
biography.name: Ann Petrén

biography.bio: Pale Olofsson was born on January 8, 1947 in Stockholm, Sweden as Paul Lennart Olofsson. He is an actor, known for Let the Right One In (2008), The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009) and A Summer Tale (2000).
biography.name: Pale Olofsson

biography.bio: Anna Kristina Kallin was born on December 6, 1953 in Umeå, Västerbottens län, Sweden. She was an actress, known for A Summer Tale (2000), Porträttet (1999) and Kurt Olsson - filmen om mitt liv som mej själv (1990). She died on August 25, 2004 in Gothenburg, Sweden.
biography.name: Anna Kristina Kallin

biography.bio: Ralph Carlsson was born on March 5, 1952 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Ralph Ingemar Karlsson. He is an actor, known for Show Me Love (1998), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and The 100 Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared (2013).
biography.name: Ralph Carlsson

biography.bio: Jerker Fahlström was born on November 4, 1956. He is known for his work on Mr. Ove (2015), Cops (2003) and A Summer Tale (2000).
biography.name: Jerker Fahlström

biography.bio: Johan Holmberg is an actor, known for The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009), Hallåhallå (2014) and She Is Dead (2002).
biography.name: Johan Holmberg
